titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 700 Grant Street in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania as the "Richard Lewis Thornburgh Courthouse".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 11/15/2010--Introduced. Designates the United States courthouse located at 700 Grant Street in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, as the "Richard Lewis Thornburgh Courthouse."
